lines.line: Hello I am Thormac the sorcerer.
Do you need anything?
Not right now, but thank you for offering.
Hello I am Thormac the sorcerer. I don't suppose you could be of assistance to me?
What do you need assistance with?
I've lost my pet scorpions. They're lesser Kharid scorpions, a very rare breed.
I left their cage door open, now I don't know where they've gone.
There's three of them, and they're quick little beasties. They're all over Gielinor.
How would I go about catching them?
Well I have a scorpion cage here which you can use to catch them in.
If you go up to the village of Seers, to the North of here, one of them will be able to tell you where the scorpions are now.
Okay, I will do it then.
I'm not interested.
Blast! I suppose I'll have to find someone else then.
I'm a little busy.
Fair enough.
How goes your quest?
I've not caught all the scorpions yet.
Well remember to go speak to the Seers, North of here, if you need any help.
Many greetings.
I need to locate some scorpions.
Well you have come to the right place. I am a master of animal detection.
Do you need to locate any particular scorpion? Scorpions are a creature somewhat in abundance.
I'm looking for some lesser Kharid scorpions. They belong to Thormac the Sorcerer.
Let me look into my looking glass.
I can see a scorpion that you seek. It would appear to be near some nasty spiders. I can see two coffins there as well.
The scorpion seems to be going through some crack in the wall. It's gone into some sort of secret room.
Well see if you can find that scorpion then, and I'll try and get you some information on the others.
Where did you say that scorpion was again?
I've retrieved the scorpion from near the spiders.

Well, I've checked my looking glass. There seems to be a kharid scorpion in a little village in the east, surrounded by lots of uncivilised-looking warriors. Some kind of merchant there seems to have picked it up.
That's all I can tell you about that scorpion.
Any more scorpions?
It's good that you should ask. I have information on the last scorpion for you.
It seems to be in some sort of upstairs room. There seems to be some sort of brown clothing lying on a table.
Are you interested in buying or selling a helmet?
I've heard you have a small scorpion in your possession.
Now how could you know about that, I wonder? Mind you, I don't have it anymore.
I gave it as a present to my brother Ivor when I visited our outpost northwest of Camelot.
Well, actually I hid it in his bed so it would nip him. It was a bit of a surprise gift.
I have retrieved all your scorpions.
Aha, my little scorpions home at last!

characters.name: Thormac
characters.description: Middle-aged male, British accent, scholarly and slightly eccentric tone. A sorcerer who lives in a tower south of Seers' Village, knowledgeable about magic but careless with his pet scorpions.

characters.name: Seer
characters.description: Elderly male, mystical and ethereal British accent, calm and knowing tone. One of the original settlers of Seers' Village with the ability to see visions through a looking glass.

characters.name: Peksa
characters.description: Adult male, gruff Nordic accent, straightforward and practical tone. A barbarian helmet merchant with a mischievous streak, enjoys pranking his brother Ivor.
